title: Who is The Final Smash Ultimate Character!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.28.21
description:
Blessing and Tim start off the week by recapping Sakurai's Smash presentation, talking about bots in Battlefield, and so much more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping

If you wanna see Greg be a pirate and play Sea of Theives, do I have the video for you. Our edited let’s play video from Greg and Mike’s Sea of Theives session is up right now on the Kinda Funny Games Youtube channels.

Speaking of ridiculous premises: A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now titled “Is Castaway Better than Star Wars Phantom Menace”. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny


Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness &Black Jack

The Roper Report   -
00:07:20 - We got that Kazuya Smash stream this morning: Here’s a recap - Chris Carter @ Destructoid
00:19:20 - Battlefield 2042 will have bots - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:20:50 - Battlefield 2042 having bots, I got questions - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:26:00 - Loki is coming to Fortnite in July - Andrew Webster @ The Verge
00:36:20 - Knockout City has a Roadmap! - Ryan Craddock @ Nintendo Life
00:39:50 - Rest in Peace to the real life Dogmeat - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:42:50 - Marvel's Avengers Will Soon Always Allow Players to Play as the Same Heroes As Others - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:43:40 - Out today
00:44:37 - Squad Up:Andrew(PSN, but it’s cross play, so add away!)  - MannyThorne
00:45:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Patricia Hernandez

Blessing and Tim start off the week by recapping Sakurai's Smash presentation, talking about bots in Battlefield, and so much more.

  • Speaking of ridiculous premises: A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now titled “Is Castaway Better than Star Wars Phantom Menace”. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
  • Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness &Black Jack
